CustomField.description: The Award Percentage field captures a percentage discount originally used by OCB for the Nonprofit scholarship. When completing the award record users should be able to input either the Award Amount or the Award Percentage but not both.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Award Percentage field captures a percentage discount originally used by OCB for the Nonprofit scholarship. When completing the award record users should be able to input either the Award Amount or the Award Percentage but not both.
CustomField.label: Award Percentage
